title: Open University Online Education Design Strategies for Lifelong Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening online instructional design competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers by applying lifelong learning and open education models

learning_goals: Explain three principles of open university instructional design and suggest lifelong learning support strategies
Implement at least two interaction design strategies (discussion, collaboration, feedback) for online learning environments
Design project-based learner portfolio management and dropout prevention strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
